org.ssa4j
Interface ScrapeConstants

public interface ScrapeConstants

Collection of System Property keys that the Scraper Framework looks for during various configuration tasks.

Author:
Rodney Aiglstorfer

Field Summary
static java.lang.String SSA4J_HOST_KEY
          The Hostname for the Screen-Scraper server
static java.lang.String SSA4J_MANAGER_KEY
          The classname of the concrete implementation of ScrapeSessionManager
static java.lang.String SSA4J_MOCKDIR_KEY
          The base directory within which all mock screen-scraper scenario files are located.
static java.lang.String SSA4J_PORT_KEY
          The Port for the Screen-Scrapper server
static java.lang.String SSA4J_SS_HOME_DIR
          The directory where screen-scraper is installed.
static java.lang.String SSA4J_TIMEOUT_KEY
          The timeout value for the RemoteScrapingSession
